title: Robert Jenrick – 2020 Comments on Building Safety Law
author: admin
summary: Text of the comments made by Robert Jenrick, the Secretary of State for Housing, Communities and Local Government, on 18 July 2020.
content:
This is a significant milestone on our journey to fundamentally improving building safety and delivering real change that will keep people safer in their homes.
